name: Cheop
overview: Cheop is an Egyptian themed platform game created by Michael Taupitz. It had multiple versions including the commonly found 2.0 version. The goal is to get the sequentially appearing vases while evading all the mummies. you can jump, push some blocks, and... that's it. The level design is a bit on the tricky side, as you can see, and there's a level editor included there... somewhere.
